factq: 60 million ether created to contributors of the presale.
fact2: 12 Million (20% of the above) were created to the development fund, most of it going to early contributors and developers and the remaining to the Ethereum Foundation.
fact3: 5 ethers are created every block (roughly 15 seconds) to the miner of the block
fact4: 2-3 ethers are sometimes sent to another miner if they were also able to find a solution but his block wasn't included (called uncle/aunt reward)
